event.title: Local FSFE Group Rhine/Main - Talk: Die Software der Zukunft liegt in unseren Händen

body.p: On Saturday, 1 July, the FSFE group Rhein/Main will meet in "Offtopia" in Offenbach to attend a talk by Guido Arnold titled "Die Software der Zukunft liegt in unseren Händen". We will meet there around 10:00 h, the talk will start at 13:30.
